entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #48861
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts #48860
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc #48859
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, plaintext #48858
  • In maui razor development, the NavigationManager.NavigateTo method fails when used continuously. #48856
  • InputNumber validation breaks when hidden and subsequently rerendered #48855
  • Add IOutputCacheBufferWriterStore #48854
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Parameter itself is passed into exception message instead of its name #48853
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage throws CryptographicException occasionally when using PersistKeysToAzureBlobStorage and ProtectKeysWithAzureKeyVault #48848
  • Give error if SSR root component has prerendering explicitly disabled #48847

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes #48826
  • Perf regression: single_query #48840
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #48846
  • HTTP logging + response body logging breaks gRPC. #48824
  • _From @mikaelm12 on Thursday, 03 January 2019 20:00:41_ #48850
  • Blazor SSR: Failed to read environment variable [DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS] #48274
  • Make SupplyParameterFromQuery cascade like SupplyParameterFromForm #48770
    Backlog
  • [SupplyParameterFromForm] attribute and declarative binding #46981
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor dotnet.wasm compression/decompression doesn't round-trip #48674
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #48794
  • Perf improvement: json #48839

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow non-NetFramework tests to be skipped with Mono #48864
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Update NuGet client dependencies #48862
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Added ppc64le architecture to support testcases on power machine. #48638
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0-preview6
  • Added JsonWebTokenHandler and TokenHandlers #48857
    area-security
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `334704d` to `18fa6a4` #48851
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Add complex form binding support to RDF #48790
    area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Retain DOM nodes during streaming SSR updates #48258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Improve GetAuthenticationStateAsync exception message #48812
    area-runtime, area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime
  • Unhide server option in blazor web template #48838
    area-blazor
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove IIS settings from Core API template. #48821
    area-mvc
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
